abstract: Samuel J. Wurzelbacher, the plumber turned author and speaker, is mulling a bid for a redrawn Congressional seat.
snippet: Samuel J. Wurzelbacher, the plumber turned author and speaker, is mulling a bid for a redrawn Congressional seat.
lead_paragraph: Samuel J. Wurzelbacher, better known as Joe the Plumber from the 2008 presidential campaign, has filed papers to run for a House seat in northern Ohio.

headline.main: Joe the Plumber May Be Joe the Candidate
